org.spongepowered.api.block.data

Interface Furnace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Carrier, DataSerializable, Lockable, TileEntity

    public interface Furnace
extends Lockable
    Represents a Furnace.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRemainingBurnTime()
      Gets the remaining time until another piece of fuel will be consumed.
      int getRemainingCookTime()
      Gets the remaining time until the next item is cooked.
      void setRemainingBurnTime(int time)
      Sets the remaining time until a new piece of fuel will be consumed.
      void setRemainingCookTime(int time)
      Sets the remaining time until a new item is cooked.

        serialize, toContainer

    • Method Detail

      • getRemainingBurnTime

        int getRemainingBurnTime()
        Gets the remaining time until another piece of fuel will be consumed. Will be zero if the furnace is not currently lit.
        Returns:
        The remaining time, in ticks

      • setRemainingBurnTime

        void setRemainingBurnTime(int time)
        Sets the remaining time until a new piece of fuel will be consumed.
        Parameters:
        time - The new time, in ticks

      • getRemainingCookTime

        int getRemainingCookTime()
        Gets the remaining time until the next item is cooked.
        Returns:
        The remaining time, in ticks

      • setRemainingCookTime

        void setRemainingCookTime(int time)
        Sets the remaining time until a new item is cooked.
        Parameters:
        time - The new time, in ticks
